name: Beepzz Cats - Kids car racing
description:
Preschool Children and Toddlers – Start Your Engines. Beepzz Cats is a fun racing kids game for cat lovers and it helps develop their reasoning, reflexes, coordination and motor skills.
Meow Meow - nine cutest kitty cats are playing with some colorful yarn balls and they really want to make some new friends. Choose your favorite virtual pet kitten from our cat shelter: Miss Kitty, Mr Fluffy, Captain Whiskers and many more are ready to play with you and have a great furry time.
A Purrfect adventure awaits in our own little Beepzz cattery with 60 different levels in the backyard, cat park, kids room, living room, garage… Let’s have fun together.

Features:

Simple racing game for kids – drive the car with an easy finger touch combination, just tap tap tap and you’ll be at the finish line very fast
9 kittens are on a mission to collect as many yarn balls as possible and get to the cat house to collect their bonus. Choose your rally car: a sports car, race car, jeep, monster truck, motorcycle or bike and hit the road, jump, flip & roll. They have cute expressions animations and make funny sounds
Different difficulty levels with plenty of ramps and obstacles that will make your race a bit more challenging, throughout 7 colorful themes: backyard, cleaning, kitchen, garage, park, living room, kids room
You always WIN – that’s right, there’s no such thing as cars bursting which means no frustration, more excitement and a valuable increase in self-esteem and self-confidence in young children
A Kids friendly design and cool graphics, topped with a smooth physics simulation and some matching sound effects of the engine, suspension and maximum speed reach are what makes this game unique and enjoyable for families with children aged 4-10

Please send us your feedback:
If you have any feedback and suggestions on how we could further improve the design and interaction of our apps and games, please visit our website www.iabuzz.com or leave us a message at kids@iabuzz.com
